subject: Tennis
lead_paragraph: Raonic, the seventh seed, reached his first Paris Masters final with a 6-3, 3-6, 7-5 win over Tomas Berdych. Raonic will face Djokovic, a 6-2, 6-3 winner over Kei Nishikori.
snippet: Raonic, the seventh seed, reached his first Paris Masters final with a 6-3, 3-6, 7-5 win over Tomas Berdych. Raonic will face Djokovic, a 6-2, 6-3 winner over Kei Nishikori.
